projects.title: Filterize
projects.description: A web app that let's you put instagram like filters on images using CSS.

projects.title: Soccer Schedule
projects.description: A web app to easily see the scores, schedule and standings of your favorite teams.

projects.title: Betta Beach
projects.description: A full-stack web app where users can search and review beaches around the world.

projects.title: Restaurant Reviews
projects.description: A Progressive Web App for reviewing restaurants which is also capable of working offline. It uses several optimization techniques to make it performant even for slow networks.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Responsive website built with React. The site content is passed in as JSON data, auto-generating components for easy maintenance.
